content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have declared your consent regarding certain types of processing activities for which the provision of your consent is voluntary (e.g., participation in a voluntary wellness program), you can withdraw this consent at any time with future effect. Such withdrawal will not affect the lawfulness of the processing prior to the consent withdrawal.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As set out in locally applicable personal data protection law you may have the right to: (i) request access to your employee information; (ii) request rectification of your employee information; (iii) request erasure of your employee information; (iv) request restriction of processing of your employee information; (v) request personal data portability; (vi) object to the processing of your employee information.Â \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Right of access:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" You may have the right to obtain from us confirmation as to whether or not personal information concerning you is processed, and, where that is the case, to request access to your personal information. The access information includes the purposes of the processing, the categories of personal information concerned, and the recipients or categories of recipient to whom your personal information have been or will be disclosed. However, this is not an absolute right and the interests of other individuals may restrict your right of access. In addition, you may access the safeguards referenced above in section 1.5 by submitting a request to access the safeguards using the contact details provided below. Further, you may have the right to obtain a copy of your personal information undergoing processing. For additional copies requested, we may charge a reasonable fee based on administrative costs in accordance with applicable law.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Right to rectification:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" You may have the right to obtain from us the rectification of inaccurate personal information. Depending on the purposes of the processing, you may have the right to have incomplete personal information completed, including by means of providing a supplementary statement.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Right to erasure (right to be forgotten):\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Under certain circumstances, you may have the right to require us to delete your personal information.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Right to restriction of processing:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Under certain circumstances, you may have the right to require us to restrict the processing of your personal information. In this case, the respective personal information will be marked and may only be processed by us for certain purposes. As EPAM processes and uses its employees' personal information primarily for purposes of carrying out the contractual employment relationship with our employees, EPAM will in principle have a legitimate interest for the processing which will override any restriction request, unless the restriction request relates to marketing activities.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Right to personal information portability:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Under certain circumstances, you may have the right to receive the personal information concerning you, which you have provided to us, in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format and to transmit this information to another entity.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Right to object:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Under certain circumstances, you may have the right to object, on grounds relating to their particular situation, at any time to the processing of your personal information by us and we can be required to no longer process their personal information.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent data protection supervisory authority. For more information about lodging a complaint with the Dutch Data Protection Authority please find more information on: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://autoriteitpersoonsgegevens.nl/nl/zelf-doen/gebruik-uw-privacyrechten/klacht-melden-bij-de-ap\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Klacht melden bij de AP | Autoriteit Persoonsgegevens\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you would like to exercise your rights, you should contact your local manager or \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:privacy@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"privacy@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
